item.title: Todd Davies - Home
item.description: I’m a 25 year old software engineer at Google Munich. In parallel, I’m studying for a masters degree in Politics and Technology at Technical University Munich. Before that, I studied Computer Science at the University of Manchester. I enjoy keeping fit, debating, philosophizing, learning, and thinking about things like policy, security, sustainability, privacy, fashion, software engineering, intelligence, etc. When I’m not doing something related to those, I’m likely working through my 2020 reading list.
